title: H.E. Mohammad bin Abdullah Al Gergawi

quotes: In 2017, Al Gergawi was named the Federal Personality of the Year by His Highness Sheikh Mohamed bin Zayed Al Nahyan, President of the United Arab Emirates.

organizations.name: Al Maktoum Global Initiatives
quotes: Al Maktoum Global Initiatives, Al Gergawi oversees numerous developmental and humanitarian projects spanning over 105 countries worldwide, serving nearly 100 million people annually.

organizations.name: Georgetown University
quotes: Among the most notable are an honorary doctorate in government administration from Georgetown University in the United States,

organizations.name: ESCP Business School
quotes: an honorary doctorate in government administration and future strategies from ESCP Business School in Paris,

organizations.name: London Business School (LBS)
quotes: an Honorary Fellowship of the London Business School (LBS).

organizations.name: American University in Cairo (AUC)
quotes: The Global Honorary Fellowship from the American University in Cairo (AUC).

organizations.name: Dubai Autism Center (DAC)
quotes: In the social field, Al Gergawi has supervised a number of social initiatives such as establishing the Dubai Autism Center (DAC)

organizations.name: UAE Disabled Sports Federation
quotes: and the UAE Disabled Sports Federation.

organizations.name: UAE national volleyball team
quotes: In addition, he represented his country as a member of the UAE national volleyball team in international competitions.
